title: Betla National Park
summary: One of India's first tiger reserves, known for elephants, bison, and rich flora.

faqs.a: Nearest railhead is Daltonganj; Ranchi airport ~170 km.
Typically morning and evening slots; check at park gate.

title: Hundru Falls
summary: A dramatic waterfall on the Subarnarekha River with scenic rock formations.

faqs.a: Viewpoints are safe; avoid getting too close to edge.

title: Cultural Festivals
summary: Sarhul, Karma, Sohrai highlight tribal heritage with dance, music, and rituals.

faqs.a: Spring festival; dates vary with the traditional calendar.
